name: Feed The Dragoness (18+)
description:
To play the game, please extract the zip file into a folder, and run the executable file.
Feel free to let me know what you think on here, or in the Weight Gaming Thread here:
https://forum.weightgaming.com/t/feed-the-dragoness-tower-defense-game/26199

WARNING: Be careful about the Bomb icon on the title screen. If you click on it, it will delete your save data!

Changelog:

v1.2:
- Updated the instructions (accessible by the blue "?" button) to include the Wild Cards.
- Added a 'warning' to let you know if any slimes are coming up on the next round, and how strong the strongest one is. Does not work in endless mode.

v1.1:
- Fixed the Upgrade menu so it works properly
- Updated New Game Plus to lower HP down to 75, and to speed up plates and slimes on the track by 25%.
- Fixed a typo on the calorie quota for Level 3.
